title: Disable Camera Zoom Without Disabling Scrolling In Shop
body: Seems liek a fairly massive oversight because i can disable the wheel completely or nothing else, i only want to disable the camera zoom not the scrolling in the shop, what settings do i need to change for that

replies.body: Y'know....I actually don't believe there is a way to disable the camera zoom entirely. I know it's not the best or anywhere near the answer you were looking for, but your best bet would be to disable the scroll wheel and click to navigate the shop if you don't want the camera *ever* zooming in.
I've looked everywhere, but I cant find a "disable scroll wheel" button in League Client...
Yeah its a shame really, would have thought by now they would just allow you to change the bindings for the zoom to something else so that you didn't need to disable the wheel altogether :(
